import React from 'react' import { useSelector} from 'react-redux' import Avatar from '../util/Avatar' import styles from './RsMenu.module.css' const RsMenu = ({isShow, setIsShow}) => { const {auth} = useSelector(state=>state) return (
  • {auth.user.username}
  • Home
  • Inbox
  • Coding
  • Change password
  • Logout
) } export default RsMenu
